channel.title: Custom Text/Forum Pictures
channel.description:
I understand why you don't have either of these. But I am suggesting that we add these for either Senior Member+ or Moparian+ They should be a right that can be taken away fairly easily by the MoparScape staff, which can be done without adding mods.
Strict rules can be set for them.
Custom Text: Example: No Flame No Racism No website URL
Picture: Example: No Porn No Nude PG 13
People abuse it, they should lose it.

item.title: Custom Text/Forum Pictures
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Davidi2:

While yes that solves the issue of inappropriate images, it doesn’t feel the same as a real avatar and it still makes the forums look cluttered. And really, if two people have the same avatar it can start to be confusing unless you aways read usernames. Personally when I see an avatar I don’t read the username if I recognize it. Kinda like if Frell and I switched avatars (and assuming we had the same awards), many people would have to do a double take

Alright, can I revise this topic to be about having custom titles? I feel that would be a great asset to the community.

Read full topic
